testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to access the FAQ's list via API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request containing invalid authorization credentials is sent to the /api/faqsList endpoint, the
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.............passed * The api user sets "api/faqsList" path parameters..........................passed * The api user saves the response returned from the api faqsList endpoint and confirms that the status code is '401' and the reason phrase is Unauthorized..passed
